website_summaries.verdict: The serrations don't cut grapefruit as easily, but they won't cut your mouth, and the substantial steel handle provides ample strength for digging.
pros: These 6 spoons are made from 18/10 stainless steel
Sharp teeth tuck under the bowl edge so you don't cut your mouth
Sturdy steel gives great pressure for scraping out grapefruit
cons: Not always sharp enough to cut completely through grapefruit

customer_reviews.title: Does anybody use grapefruit spoons anymore?
customer_reviews.text: I have a set of grapefruit spoons handed down to me by my grandma. My kids grew up using them. After looking at the local kitchen and big box stores forever it seems, I decided to just go online and find. I purchased these for my daughter for Christmas and she loves them - very good quality spoons. They make eating a grapefruit so easy, as you can saw through the pulp with their serated edge and then scoop out each section with a perfectly sized utensil.
customer_reviews.author: mrshlovejesus

customer_reviews.title: Grapefruit spoons?
customer_reviews.text: I tried to purchase some grapefruit spoons at a local big box store. When asking a clerk for assistance she gave me a blank stare and asked "what the heck are grapefruit spoons?" I knew it was time to check out amazon and find what I needed. These spoons are 18/10 stainless and are a nice weight. The spoon length, design, and serrated edges are just what I was looking for. The added bonus of buying online and not having to confuse store clerks is priceless.
customer_reviews.author: satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Grapefruit is easier to eat
customer_reviews.text: A month ago my husband was having trouble eating a grapefruit. He was peeling it and dividing it into sections and there were too many hard to chew membranes. And then I remembered grapefruit spoons. One of the best birthday presents I ever gave him.
customer_reviews.author: Stough

customer_reviews.title: Good basic product
customer_reviews.text: Does what a grapefruit should do. Sturdy enough that it doesn't bend under normal use, edges are sharp enough to get the pieces out of the rind. Reasonably priced product. Would recommend for every day use. Not very fancy design if that's what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. RobTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good except for 2 of them
customer_reviews.text: One of the 6 spoons did not get serrations on the left side. Another had a small dent/chip in the bowl (not pictured). I've had good luck with my other Artaste items. This one slipped past QC it seems.
customer_reviews.author: Metalcastr

customer_reviews.title: Heavy handles = food all over
customer_reviews.text: It's nice looking, but not the most practical because the end of the handle is much heavier than the rest. These are always falling out of my bowls. If you're only planning on using them on plates or larger bowls, you'll probably like these.
customer_reviews.author: D. KimTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and useful for sectioning out fruit especially grapefruit and kiwi fruits.
customer_reviews.author: LAX

customer_reviews.title: Have not been able to find any I like until these
customer_reviews.text: When I moved, it seems one of my kids grabbed my grapefruit spoons. Have not been able to find any I like until these! They're great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and weight for an excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for someone else as a gift but when I saw that they matched my silverware, I kept them. They are very nice quality. At first when I received them in the mail I couldn’t imagine what it was because they were so heavy!
customer_reviews.author: Nana of 2

customer_reviews.title: Great set of spoons!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use - they are sharp enough to eat Italian ice, grapefruit not sharp enough to hurt you. They are a heavy weight and come in a nice box. I wish I bought these sooner!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Great Grapefruit spoons
customer_reviews.text: They have a sturdy feel so I know they will last, The serrated edge cut the grapefruit easily, but felt totally smooth in my mouth, I honestly would not have known the serrations were there.
customer_reviews.author: Deb M

customer_reviews.title: I love using them for eating kiwi fruit
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are elegant! I love using them for eating kiwi fruit. They can be used for many other purposes too. The merchant packaged them very well and they arrived quickly. I would recommend this merchant and these spoons to anyone who is interested!
customer_reviews.author: AZsunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great service!
customer_reviews.text: I originally received my order with only 5 grapefruit spoons. I called Artaste and they were very accommodating; I received the 6th spoon the very next day! Spoons are of good quality and very reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.author: Judy A

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful high quality product!
customer_reviews.text: It came in a lovely professional high end finish box. I opened it up and was delighted with the spoons. Heavy weight high quality expertly designed product. So glad I ordered these
customer_reviews.author: caldrich

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful spoons!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful finished, curved, smooth finished edges, it is a pleasure to use and hold in hand.
customer_reviews.author: abcdefg

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are outstanding. Good weight, they're 18/10 stainless steel. Sleek, nice design.
customer_reviews.author: Louisa

customer_reviews.title: Sleek spoons
customer_reviews.text: The serrations on the spoons definitely make grapefruit eating more efficient. The spoons are sleek looking and I appreciate the fact that they don't have a pattern, so they will fit in with anyone's existing flatware.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian B.

customer_reviews.title: fancy
customer_reviews.text: nice and fancy. great for yogurt! A little heavy but works perfect
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for getting all the grapefruit. I would spend a little extra and get the knife. These are really a good quality. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Matassa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent spoons, purchasing again
customer_reviews.text: Best spoons I've purchased for the price. Excellent feel because of the weight of the spoon. Feels like you're holding real silverware (versus the cheap and thin stuff now).
customer_reviews.author: John Pyles

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: These are the best spoons ever. I could never understand why a person would purchase a specific spoon for grapefruit. However, I now understand exactly how useful the right utensil can be. I no longer use a knife to cut between the sections and then a spoon to scoop out the fruit. Boy have I been missing out all of these years.
customer_reviews.author: AMGray

customer_reviews.title: Handy small tool in your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I use it to remove cantaloupe's and papaya"s seeds out very quick and neat. It saves more juice and it did not ruin the fleshes than the regular spoon. I also give it to to my daughters and friends. They're all so happy to have it in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: LCK

customer_reviews.title: Solid effective spoon. Good value
customer_reviews.text: Happy with shine, shape and weight of spoons. Serated edge effective with grapefruits.
customer_reviews.author: Bytownmom

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking spoons work great
customer_reviews.text: Pleased- works great and nice looking spoons- what's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Ed camp

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Have worked well and holding up well to almost daily use.
customer_reviews.author: K Larson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Spoons are good, edges could have been a little shaper
customer_reviews.author: K.M.

customer_reviews.title: Just okay...not my grandma's quality of grapefruit spoons
customer_reviews.text: Just okay as serrated edges aren't sharp enough on this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Much nicer than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful, nice heavy weight. I was presently surprised. I highly recommend. VERY HAPPY with my new grapefruit spoons!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Calvin Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seldom do you find such a substantial spoon. Most grapefruit spoons are wimpy, these are not
customer_reviews.author: Ron Halpern

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The teeth are not sharp enough to cleanly get the sections out of the grapefruit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend the grapefruit knives instead
customer_reviews.text: I recommend the grapefruit knives instead. These spoons do not work as well. They are thick and do not extract the pieces well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: work well and are heavier than my old grapefruit spoons
customer_reviews.author: bf

customer_reviews.title: I bought these because they received really good reviews. However they are quite disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they received really good reviews. However they are quite disappointing. They are not serrated enough to cut the grapefruit and instead mash the fruit. Definitely do not recommend as a grapefruit spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Watson's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Check the accuracy of order
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a set of 12 pieces but I got only 6 pieces
customer_reviews.author: Prem

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are much better quality than expected. They have a good heft to them and a clear shine.
customer_reviews.author: Neta Blackwell Kira

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected for the price. They hold up well in the dishwasher, too.
customer_reviews.author: RetailTherapist

customer_reviews.title: These are a great value!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality spoons especially for the very reasonable price!!
customer_reviews.author: Yooper

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect, scratch resistance
customer_reviews.text: I bought to try a new brand, it's perfect, scratch resistance, and mantine the shining after server use. great great product.
customer_reviews.author: DanielMP

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The dinnerware has a very nice weight and design. The dinner fork length is perfect. All was great for 30 days of use when rings of rust began to appear on the knives. I am very particular about drying and polishing my dinnerware when taking it out of the dishwasher so I can only assume this is a flaw in the materials.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Not Regular Spoons
customer_reviews.text: Granted, pretty dumb. But, I thought these were regular spoons and did not look close enough at the description and the pictures do not clearly capture it. But, these are *grapefruit* spoons with a beveled edge. These are unusable as regular spoons. If you actually want grapefruit spoons, maybe this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Public Name Here

customer_reviews.title: Enhance your grapefruit experience
customer_reviews.text: Bowl of spoon is very slightly larger than typical grapefruit spoon and depth is adequate to hold the juice. Size and finish quality are a good match to my Williams-Sonoma oversize flatware. Finish and heft/balance in hand are very good. Design is unobtrusive and blends well even though not an exact match. If they were just a little bit thicker I'd give them a fifth star, but these are the most substantial new grapefruit spoon this grapefruit fan has found so far. They'll add another increment to my grapefruit pleasure every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Carlooks

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice spoons
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as extras--because I was always running out of teaspoons, and this pattern would go well with (if necessary) my existing pattern of flatware. The quality of these seems to be high: I've noticed no flaws, and the weight and balance are good, if a bit on the heavy side. Please note that these spoons are a little larger than standard teaspoon flatware, but smaller than the table or soup spoons.
customer_reviews.author: D. Knight

customer_reviews.title: NOT DISHWASHER SAFE
customer_reviews.text: ***NOT DISHWASHER SAFE*** Rust spots appeared after 1 dishwasher cycle. Dishwasher is BOSCH Silent Plus 44db. Detergent used was Cascade Platinum. I am more frustrated than anything as I thought spending the extra money of flatware would be beneficial in terms of cleaning efficiency. The design of this is beautiful, the quality... not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Fess

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Functional
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are an elegant addition to my silverware set. I prefer a simple, streamlined design, so these are ideal for me. They work well for eating grapefruit, but they are also nice if eating anything out of a small container, such as yogurt. I prefer a narrow grapefruit spoon to fit into the sections rather than a wide one, and these are just right!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia of Broadmoor

customer_reviews.title: NOT DISHWASHER SAFE
customer_reviews.text: ***NOT DISHWASHER SAFE*** Rust spots appeared after 1 dishwasher cycle. Dishwasher is BOSCH Silent Plus 44db. Detergent used was Cascade Platinum. I am more frustrated than anything as I thought spending the extra money of flatware would be beneficial in terms of cleaning efficiency. The design of this is beautiful, the quality... not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Fess

customer_reviews.title: Elegant looking spoons but not good with grapefruit.
customer_reviews.text: The spoons are very well made, sturdy and beautiful. They would be great for a nice table setting. However, the edges are not sharp enough to cut through grapefruit without multiple attempts. They are usable, but just barely.
customer_reviews.author: jetpilotjr

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality grapefruit spoons
customer_reviews.text: The spoons work very well. Teeth are sharp enough to section the grapefruit but not too sharp to be uncomfortable on the lips. Just received so we are unable to rate durability but the finish seems good. Will update if there are durability issues.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good spoons, 1 Defective
customer_reviews.text: I like the spoons and have bought an entire set. However, one of the spoons was razor sharp on the edge. It was so sharp it could cut your lip. It's looks like somebody went to town with a grinding wheel on one side. I'll make due with 11 tea spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Jones

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty...on heavier side, but that is perfect. Exactly what I was looking forward. Does an excellent job in scooping / eating really frozen / hard ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Angelbeybe

customer_reviews.title: Too dull
customer_reviews.text: I bought these spoons after reading reviews that said they are sharp enough to work well. I am disappointed because they are too dull. You end up pulverizing the grapefruit you are trying to eat. I have two old ones that work much better even though they are not as nice in terms of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Rusted after one wash.....
customer_reviews.text: Has rusted after first dishwasher cycle. I bought these thinking price was equal to quality. Guess I was wrong. Jokes on me I guess. I through away the box. Thanks for nothing.stay far far away.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Wide and cuts well
customer_reviews.text: I bought a more expensive one from crate and barrel and it is really narrow and doesn’t cut as well as these. These are also wider and they have held up quite well running through the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crutcher

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: nice quality, and I use them for everything...... even great for de-seeding cucumbers, etc.... was hard to find in stores, and these work great and good quality.....
customer_reviews.author: weezy

customer_reviews.title: Another great set.
customer_reviews.text: These match the other sets perfectly. They are a spoon with a point and created edges along the sides of the spoon. I don’t consider them dessert spoons... Definitely great grapefruit spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality - nothing to complain about.
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice quality spoons. I used to have grapefruit spoons and over the years they disappeared. Perhaps I should check my adult children's silverware drawers. Anyway, I purchased these spoons and am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Duffy6

customer_reviews.title: Thin but plenty strong.
customer_reviews.text: The handles of these spoons are not exactly thick but are more than substantial enough to make their way through a grapefruit without difficulty. They are 2-3 mm at the narrowest and showed no signs of bending when put through a minor stress test. Very good spoons for the money. Also they are simply marked Artaste 18/10 so if they are made in China they don't advertise it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Just

customer_reviews.title: Wrong shape for grapefruit spoons!
customer_reviews.text: The bowl is too wide and the teeth too shallow to be really effective for removing the fruit from a half grapefruit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality grapefruit spoons
customer_reviews.text: Very nice weight and does exactly what it is designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Mellie_998

customer_reviews.title: Clever spoon and perfect for my uses
customer_reviews.text: Work perfectly for my kiwis. Haven't tried them on grapefruit but I'm sure they'll be good
customer_reviews.author: red she said

customer_reviews.title: Stainless
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much a standard design. But the price was right for a stainless steel spoon like this and they are of a good weight.
customer_reviews.author: CEW

customer_reviews.title: we love them. Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had these in years. Now that were livng in AZ and have grapefruites in our yard, we love them. Thank you Amazon! Melody Babbitt
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - No exactly as shown in the photos
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a present because of the good reviews and I thought they looked nicer than the other spoons I had seen. The ones I received were packaged very well in a nice box. The spoons inside do not look like the ones pictured. They are just normal spoons without the darker coloring that is shown in the photos. The picture insert in the box also shows the darker area on the spoon that is not on the ones I recieved. They do still seems like good quality, heavy spoons and my aunt will never know the difference but sadly I do. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wright

customer_reviews.title: The spoons are very pretty. They squirt a lot of juice (all over) ...
customer_reviews.text: The spoons are very pretty. They squirt a lot of juice (all over) while eating with them. They are very comfortable to hold, which is very good, but they are not the best grapefruit spoons I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice grapefruit spoon set
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice grapefruit spoon set. They have a nice weight to them - not too heavy, but not too light. The only thing I don't like is that these spoons could be a little thinner, but it's just a small setback and really doesn't cause any problems. All in all, great spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Sunyoung

customer_reviews.title: The perfect grapefruit spoon
customer_reviews.text: Heavy stainless steel spoons that will last forever. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: tefljudy

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are great. They feel solid and work very well, and look good too. Well worth the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler D Servies

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent heavy-weight set of silverware. I love the simple, clean design and the price was a fantastic bargain.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Well made, great size & weight.
customer_reviews.text: These are strong, weighty spoons! Perfect for small deserts as well as citrus.
customer_reviews.author: Lion King

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality grapefruit spoons. Also, great for eating ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Spoons
customer_reviews.text: Nice spoons, and they work so well! They were exactly what I was looking for. They are smooth, strong, and sharp.
customer_reviews.author: 108beavnme

customer_reviews.title: A heavy duty high quality spoon
customer_reviews.text: A heavy duty high quality spoon. It could be a bit sharper. Some of the smaller wedges get a bit macerated.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Good quality and great design. They are a little bottom heavy and don't always stay put when you place them in a bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packaged and great quality. Wouldn't think twice about ordering them again!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are great! They are sturdy and sharp. Perfect for grapefruit!
customer_reviews.author: judy smith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy weighted solid spoon. Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: kam

customer_reviews.title: Do the job they are designed for.
customer_reviews.text: Serrated edge works well. Nice weight. Do look a bit gereric.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Weldon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful forks with good solid weight to them. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Yummy fresh grapefruit.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Nice feel to the hand and mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Gram57

customer_reviews.title: NOT DISHWASHER SAFE
customer_reviews.text: ***NOT DISHWASHER SAFE*** Rust spots appeared after 1 dishwasher cycle. Dishwasher is BOSCH Silent Plus 44db. Detergent used was Cascade Platinum. I am more frustrated than anything as I thought spending the extra money of flatware would be beneficial in terms of cleaning efficiency. The design of this is beautiful, the quality... not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Fess

product_meta.title: Artaste 59373 Rain 18/10 Stainless Steel Grapefruit Dessert Spoon, 6.35-Inch, Set of 6
product_meta.description: Size:Grapefruit Dessert SpoonClassic flatware is an essential part of any kitchen, whether in a restaurant or at home. Delight in one of our simple, yet elegant stainless steel flatware sets today.
feature_bullets: 6 piece Grapefruit Spoon is made from forged 18/10 stainless steel with extra thick ergonomics handle.
Rain II pattern is simple and elegant with reflective mirror finish.
Expertly crafted flatware will last for years.
To see other products please visit the newly launched Artaste storefront.
